resources.string: The NCAA Mens Basketball Tournament was founded in 1907
Kansas won the very first NCAA Mens Division Basketball Championship game
Teams have ever entered the NCAA Mens Basketball Tournament undefeated.
North Carolina won the 2009 NCAA Mens Basketball Championship
The very first Final Four, played in 1939, was held in Evanston, Illinois
Indiana won the 1981 NCAA Final Four
UNC has made it to the Final Four 12 times
John Calipari is the highest paid college basketball coach
Chris Webber was a member of Michigans Fab Five.
Michael Jordan played for the University of North Carolina
